title: Market Capitalization and Valuation Metrics of Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd

content.text: As of the latest available data, Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd has a market capitalization of $15.82 billion.
Here are some relevant valuation ratios for Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd:
The P/E ratio for Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd is 30.12, which indicates that investors are willing to pay $30.12 for every dollar of earnings. This ratio is higher than the industry average.
The P/S ratio for Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd is 4.51, suggesting that investors are paying $4.51 for every dollar of sales. This ratio is also higher than the industry average.

The P/B ratio for Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd is 2.19, indicating that investors are paying 2.19 times the book value per share. This ratio is lower than the industry average, suggesting that the stock may be undervalued.
The P/CF ratio for Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd is 17.25, indicating that investors are paying $17.25 for every dollar of cash flow. This ratio is higher than the industry average.
Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd currently offers a dividend yield of 1.65%, which is lower than the industry average.

Overall, Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd has a relatively high market capitalization compared to industry benchmarks. The valuation ratios suggest that the stock may be trading at a premium, especially when considering the P/E and P/S ratios. However, the lower P/B ratio indicates potential undervaluation. Investors should consider these factors and evaluate the company's prospects before making investment decisions.
